title: PowerToFly
description: Hiring platform that matches talented women in tech with companies that value diversity in their teams.

title: Crossover
description: Crossover connects companies to the best, high-skill talent around the world, and also helps them manage, pay, and increase the productivity of that talent.

title: Crossover Techtrial
description: Techtrial platform is used by evaluation team to assess the code tests submitted by candidates and provide scores.

title: Smithfield eCAR
description: eCAR is an application that helps the client to create a 'Capital Appropriation Request' that includes all the details about the CAR. A particular CAR, once submitted to the flow goes through different steps for review, where reviewers can approve/decline/resubmit the CAR.

title: Smithfield eCAR Mobile
description: The application allows the managers to view the CARs waiting for their review in the queue. Each CAR itself drills down to detailed information, the list of attached documents, all reviewers in the process and an interface where the manager can approve/reject the request or leave a comment.

title: QR Mobile
description: QR Mobile application allows sales professionals to better understand their clients based on aggregating and understanding purchase history and provides prioritized client forecasts.

title: Travel-O-Pedia
description: The application is a tour guide for travelers across the world and provides information about destinations - major attractions, events, history, language and safety tips, weather and maps. It provides the facility to store their favorites and access them offline and to create tours for their travel.

title: iConference
description: The application is used by attendees in large conferences in order to build their Agenda; see all sessions at one glance, day-wise, venue-wise or type-wise; locate the venue in maps, search for different sessions, share their contacts using QR Technology, maintain their profile as well as QR Code for sharing; maintain their communities for sharing anything instantly; networking among like- minded people and access to twitter.

title: CloudPhire
description: The cloudphire application is built specifically for SAPPHIRE visitors. It provides access to all tweets, vine videos and twitpic posted on Twitter with ‚#sapphire‛ as a hashtag. Application received great response at the event as mentioned in The Wall Street Journal: http://online.wsj.com/article/PR-CO-20130514-913982.html?mod=googlenews_ws

title: Nuway Address Book
description: NAB application allows the user to access all their contacts at one place with easy to access and user-friendly UI. Calling/sending an email to a contact is just a tap away. The user can easily access Facebook/LinkedIn profiles of their contacts from the app. Offline storage enabled.

title: Aapka Dost
description: Aapka Dost application is your new friend in the city to guide you through all the events, movies or restaurants you are searching for. Music lovers can enjoy radio while driving or anytime they want. Application allows user to book ticket for the event they are willing to attend through high secure Paypal Express Checkout.

title: Budget Manager (In Progress)
description: Web solution for maintaining expense enteries and generating monthly/quarterly/yearly reports.
